resources.string: You need to agree to the authentication statement.

To access the analytics features provided with this app, you are required to authenticate with the Spotify API. You may authenticate with the Spotify API through the Spotify application, if it is installed locally on your Android device, or you may authenticate through a WebView provided. If you are not already logged into your Spotify account, you will be required to enter your Spotify login credentials and accept the supplied scopes. \n \nBy authenticating with the Spotify API, you acknowledge that we do not share your data with third party sources, and only store data that is relevant to the scope of analytical results provided. Please also note that on-demand playback requires a Spotify premium account or an Android tablet which supports this feature.
